name: Nanuk - The dusk of the brutes
name_original: Nanuk - The dusk of the brutes
description:
An adventure in the Age of Caves, where a young man is forced to fight with adversaries and jurastic animals that are
under the effect of a spell. Cause of a villain who imprisoned the master sorceress and sucks her energy, to
dominate the entire prehistoric planet.
His goal is to rescue her and destroy this monster. Main Features
  • Attack your opponents and bosses with multiple ax strikes.
  • You will be transformed into a pterosaur where you can fly and shoot fireballs at your enemies.
  • Unleash magic, breaking a portal to transform into an aggressive dinosaur and destroy your enemies with powerful headbutts.
  • Use the ability to jump and attack with the ax for more aggressive attacks.
  • Attack the last boss by jumping at exact moments and use small blows to hit him and be victorious, to rescue your princess.
